synopsis.p: Train a document categorizer using the OpenNLP library.

description.p: trains a document categorizer using the OpenNLP library. The documents and their class are specified by documents and categoryFeature. The classifier algorithm uses the document content specified by tokens and form.
By default the features are BOW but can be deactivated with bagOfWords. Additionally nGrams can be set to add n-gram features.
The classifier is stored in classifier. This file can be used by OpenNLPDocumentCategorizer.

param-doc.name: algorithm
param-doc.p:
Categorization algorithm. Must be one of:
naive-bayes, nb
generalized-iterative-scaling, gis
perceptron
quasi-newton, qn, l-bfgs, lbfgs, bfgs

param-doc.name: categoryFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where the category is read.

param-doc.name: classWeights
param-doc.p: Weight of samples of each class. This parameter is useful to compensate unbalanced training sets. The default weight is 1.

param-doc.name: language
param-doc.p: Language of the documents (ISO 639-1 two-letter code).

param-doc.name: model
param-doc.p: File where to store the classifier.

param-doc.name: nGrams
param-doc.p: Maximum size of n-gram features (minimum is 2). If not set, then do not use n-gram features.
